interview_questions.question: 🏢 Let's begin with your professional role. Could you share your job title and main responsibilities?
⌛ How long have you been in this position, and what's your experience in this industry?
📅 Can you describe a typical day in your role? What does your daily workflow look like?
⏳ During a regular workday, which tasks or activities take up most of your time?
🔍 What are the key challenges or pain points you face in your day-to-day work?
🤔 Are there any repetitive tasks in your workflow that you believe could be streamlined or automated?
💡 In your opinion, how could AI assist in enhancing your role or the overall efficiency of your work?
📈 Can you recall a recent instance where automation or AI would have significantly helped in your work?
🌐 When considering an AI-based solution, what specific features or capabilities would be most beneficial for you?
🚀 How receptive is your organization to integrating AI into its operations? What's the general attitude towards technological innovation?
